Class Term

  • java.lang.Object
    • Term
  • public class Term
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a term or semester at an academic institution. For example: the Winter 2024 Term from 10th September 2024 to 10th January 2025.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Term​(java.lang.String termDatesRecord)
      Creates a term object from a term dates record.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Gets this semester's end date.

      Gets this semester's name.
      Date getStartDate()
      Gets this semester's start date.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Term

        public Term​(java.lang.String termDatesRecord)
        Creates a term object from a term dates record.
        Parameters:
        termDatesRecord - a term dates record with the format: "semester start date (DD-MM-YY), semester end date (DD-MM-YY), semester short name" For example: "10-09-24, 10-01-25, Winter 2024"
